channel.title: How to edit your account on a 562 server!? help!
channel.description: Heh, 'ive been having trouble making myself owner ect. because i can only find dat. files of my character. can somebody ell me where i edit this!

item.title: How to edit your account on a 562 server!? help!
item.dc:creator: @lil.astar lil.astar
item.description:
@lil.astar wrote:

Lol, Go to YOURSOURCE>Data>Saved Games> And Open your character file in notepad and change the “0” to “2”

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit your account on a 562 server!? help!
